game.name: Snow Resort Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Step into the world of Snow Resort Simulator. Tackle daily responsibilities: upgrade facilities, maintain a cozy resort, satisfy guests with freshly cooked meals and drinks, and keep your inventory fully stocked. Be prepared for the challenges that come with winter.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the world of Snow Resort Simulator. Tackle daily responsibilities: upgrade facilities, maintain a cozy resort, satisfy guests with freshly cooked meals and drinks, and keep your inventory fully stocked. Be prepared for the challenges that come with winter.
